output.sentences: From the airplane, we got an exciting overall glimpse of the location where we were vacationing.
We loved the view from the sky.
We could see the stadium where we were going to watch a soccer game.
We spent a lot of time in the sun on our trip
My favorite part of the trip was visiting the beautiful statue.
